Name: Divine Retribution
Title: Rosaria: Divine Retribution
Source: Reward for inviting Rosaria to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Divine Retribution
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1113]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1113] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S11132]</color> once.
After your $[A1113], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S11032]</color>, or after you generate <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C111133]</color>, create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C332002]</color> card in your Hand.
(You must have $[A1113] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C111133.Name: Shadowshade
C111133.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When dealing Skill DMG:</color> Remove this status and double the DMG dealt for this instance.

C332002.Name: Changing Shifts
C332002.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The next time you perform "Switch Character":</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die.
